name: Walking Statue of Waterdeep

traits.name: Crumbling Colossus
entries: When the statue drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Immutable Form
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The statue deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 29 (3d12 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hurled Stone
entries: Ranged atk +16 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. 43 (6d10 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage.

immune: bludgeoning (from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons)
piercing (from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons)
slashing (from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons)
